name: Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles
storyline:
A group of friends participate in an escape room but things do not go entirely as planned. Three of them are attacked by a demon, while the others will do anything to save them. An exorcist priest helps them by giving them an ancient pendant capable of giving them powers to fight the adversities they will encounter on their journey.
In fact, shortly afterwards they discover that there is much more behind it: a mysterious hooded man begins to intrude into their lives claiming to be looking for fragments of an ancient dark amulet in their possession.
This is how the incredible story of “Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles” begins. From here on, the purpose of the group of friends will be to retrieve the amulet fragments before the hooded man and face the monstrosities and obstacles he summons, so as to prevent the return of a very powerful dark demon.
summary:
"Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles" is a turn-based RPG inspired by the great classics set in the present day.
It tells of the misadventures of a group of bizarre friends who, thanks to the powers gained from an ancient pendant, must prevent a mysterious individual from getting his hands on a dark talisman that could compromise the future of the world. There's just one problem... Let's just say that our friends are not the classic heroes expected to save the planet.
Form your ideal team and explore a total of seven levels filled with puzzles, riddles, obstacles, hidden rewards, and face hordes of strange enemies and monsters in turn-based combat with simple but strategic and often challenging mechanics.
